title: Strengthening Business Strategy Competencies: Ethical Instructional Design for Balancing Academic Freedom and Learning Rights

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze conflict cases between instructional freedom and learning rights and explain ethical instructional design principles
Learners can propose at least three measures to ensure learner rights when designing effective mathematics pedagogy in VR environments
Learners can develop ethically sound instructional designs applicable to real educational scenarios through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
